text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS VivoBook Pro Performance Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750H, GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB M.2 SSD, 15.6" 4K Ultra HD WideView Touch Display, Fingerprint Sensor, N580GD-XB76T. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Valorant, and the performance throttles significantly. The screen brightness has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the ASUS VivoBook Pro Performance Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750H, GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB M.2 SSD, 15.6" 4K Ultra HD WideView Touch Display, Fingerprint Sensor, N580GD-XB76T since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the battery life feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the ASUS VivoBook Pro Performance Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750H, GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB M.2 SSD, 15.6" 4K Ultra HD WideView Touch Display, Fingerprint Sensor, N580GD-XB76T since day one. performance throttles under load and the trackpad feels cheap. Performance in AAA gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS VivoBook Pro Performance Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750H, GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB M.2 SSD, 15.6" 4K Ultra HD WideView Touch Display, Fingerprint Sensor, N580GD-XB76T. It overheats frequently when playing Valorant, and the performance throttles significantly. The screen brightness has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS VivoBook Pro Performance Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750H, GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB M.2 SSD, 15.6" 4K Ultra HD WideView Touch Display, Fingerprint Sensor, N580GD-XB76T. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The speakers has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
